resources.string: Responsi
Responsi Pemrograman 2
Mahfudz Aji
I am strong.
I believe in myself.
Each day is a new opportunity to grow and be a better version of myself.
Every challenge in my life is an opportunity to learn from.
I have so much to be grateful for.
Good things are always coming into my life.
New opportunities await me at every turn.
I have the courage to follow my heart.
Things will unfold at precisely the right time.
I will be present in all the moments that this day brings.
Everything is better when you\'re here.
I appreciate it when you...
I couldn\'t do this without you.
I really love the new outfit. It looks great on you!
I\'m so lucky to be with you.
I’m so thankful to have you in my life.
It impressed me when you...
Thank you for...
You are doing such a great job. I’m really proud of you.
You are one of my favorite people to be around.
You are so special to me.
You are the best.
Your support means so much to me.
You’re an inspiration!
